brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match decide to pass or block each IP address, depending on whether it is Public (the Internet) or Private (small local network) Class A, B, and C only.

Choose PASS or BLOCK for the following addresses (Done at ISP router).

106.203.129.20
192.168.255.9
202.212.92.19
172.30.126.188
16.140.190.230
10.3.77.123
56.174.95.242
192.168.0.200
11.223.27.139
172.17.37.5
